title: Plugin_202203222522679
cpl.readme:
; Utility plugin
The utility plugin objective is to provide set of tools for authors. These tools includes simple transclusions, show raw contents of tiddlers, author tools, wikitext macros, show fields in view mode, and much more!

; Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Utility/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Utility
cpl.title: $:/plugins/kookma/utility
cpl.author: Mohammad Rahmani
cpl.name: Utility
cpl.description: Small tools for authors and developers
